title: GD subwars 11:00 est. Gold/Silvers vs Platinums/Bronze & Diamonds!!!!
body:
Im trying to organize a GD custom game on friday at 10:00 pm EST!  Gold/ silvers vs the Plats/Diamonds and Bronze. Be there or be square! no flaming no rage. Name will be: GDOP pass will be : bronzoid 

**Team 1: White Gold (Gold+ Silver)**

ADC: ezreal edgeworth? (silver 4)
SUP:  Chortle (gold 5)
TOP: Baconstripz  (silver 1)
JUNG: CTElephant (silver 5)
MID: pleep (gold 3)

**Team 2: Diamond in the Ruff ( Bronze+ Diamond/Plat)**

ADC: Ezreal Wright       (platinum 1)             
SUP: Jikker                    (Wood 5)                 
TOP: Girugamesh      or   Chickenwrap?       
JUNG: Shyvana420      (bronze 3)               
MID: Mia Belle Volpe   (platinum 1)             
  

Spectators/trash talkers:  Legal loli, freezer flare., Dlittlejohn

Subs: Nuparu (diamond), face the win (diamond), Urfu (diamond), noobsaiboot (lvl 5), reasonating fart, van grant, chikenwrap. (diamond)




Edit: GD celebs have preference for all roles
